channel.title: Hardware on Jef Claes
channel.description: Recent content in Hardware on Jef Claes

item.title: History of my Frankenstein PC
item.description:
This week I decided to buy a new PC, because my old one was randomly rebooting, was really out-of-date and because I deserved it. My old PC had turned into a Frankenstein PC over the years, that’s why I decided to write a little summary of the modifications I did to it over the years.
My new PC only had a 40GB hard drive, which wasn’t that big of a problem at first.
